EmailTemplate.name: 16.CEM.MotiveCDP.none.D.G.N.2315.Email 3 - On-demand webinar - Manage, secure an
EmailTemplate.subject: Concerned about how you will meet your IoT business goals? Watch our webinar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Manage. Secure. Take control. Finally, a connected device management platform for mobile, smart home and IoT 24 billion IoT and 10 million mobile devices — by 2020! This webinar will get you ready. We discuss the ins and outs of device management and how to get to market fast, scale quickly and manage millions of things — all from one platform. The Nokia Motive Connected Device Platform has over 10 years of experience and 1.5 billion devices under management for 300+ customers worldwide. This webinar will help you to achieve your most critical business goals. Reduce your OPEX and increase customer satisfaction. Connect with us © 2016 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
